subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Configuration Problem
author: Elabeth
full_text:
Pretty much any speakers designed for use with an ipod will work with the radio.
Thinkgeek.com has some good loud ones that you can recharge by
plugging into a usb port.
~Elabeth

On Wed, Aug 13, 2008 at 1:36 PM, Chad Wiggins <cawiggins78@...> wrote:
> lol. Thanks for that Elabeth. I bought the Kinyo speakers also, they are the
> ones that plug into the wall. Not like yours Aaron, I wish they had them.
> Anyway, I'm taking them back. Quality sucks. I guess I'll figure it out
> eventually. Thanks guys
